hearts.title: Help Farmer Diah
hearts.desc: Help Diah by watering corn, stomping wurm mounds, feeding cattle, and defending the fields.

hearts.title: Help Farmer Test George
hearts.desc: Make the area around the pumping station safe for Farmer George.

hearts.title: Help Farmer Eda
hearts.desc: Eda could use some help in her orchard, especially with the spider infestation.

hearts.title: Assist the Seraph at Shaemoor Garrison
hearts.desc: Drive back centaur forces and secure remaining farmlands.
